dict.acceptation: 洞，孔；洞穴，穴；缺陷；<口>绝境；

sent.trans: 于是magpie就带着blackbird来到一个hole旁边。

sent.orig: The machining includes drilling hole, machining inner conic hole, boring and trimming for smooth connection.
sent.trans: 第二、机械加工：打孔及加工内锥孔，再用专用模、夹具钻孔，镗孔成型，然后修整外形至光滑连接。

sent.orig: The beginning of the third hole, hit Presbyterian perfect results, almost all of one hole.
sent.trans: 第三个洞开始，长老打出超完美的成绩，几乎都是一杆进洞。

sent.orig: The hole is a light to the naked eye can see through the hole surface.
sent.trans: 孔洞是指在光芒照射下用肉眼可以看得见的穿越纸背的小孔。

sent.orig: After he sees a person digs one hole, another person hole fill and level up.
sent.trans: 他看见一个人挖一坑后，另一个人又把坑填平。
